resources.string: Mandy\'s ability can only be used once per turn. Additional chances do not take her ability into account.
Skids\' ability can only be used once per turn. Additional chances do not take his ability into account.
The reroll ones ability can only be used once per turn. Additional chances do not take this ability into account.
